Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to disability benefits for certain deputy sheriff members in the sheriff's department of a city with a population of one million or more
Summary: Provides a presumption for accidental disability benefits for certain deputy sheriff members in the sheriff's department of a city with a population of one million or more who in performance of their duties contract human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), tuberculosis or hepatitis.
LawCode: Add ยง607-m, R & SS L; add ยง207-r, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law and the general municipal law, in relation to accidental disability benefits for certain deputy sheriff members in the sheriff's department of a city with a population of one million or more
